mapper.select: select num, author, title, content, to_char(writeday,'yyyy/mm/dd')writeday,readcnt from board where title LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' where author LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' order by num desc
mapper.insert: insert into board(num, title, author, content) values (board_seq.nextval,#{title}, #{author}, #{content})
insert into boardreply(contentNum, author, content, writeday) values (#{contentNum}, #{author}, #{content}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update boardreply set author=#{author}, content=#{content}, where contentNum=#{contentNum}
